abstract: As Warren E. Buffett takes on Burlington Northern Santa Fe in his biggest-ever deal, he is looking to sell off his stakes in two other big railroad companies, Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern.
snippet: As Warren E. Buffett takes on Burlington Northern Santa Fe in his biggest-ever deal, he is looking to sell off his stakes in two other big railroad companies, Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:16 p.m. As Warren E. Buffett takes on Burlington Northern Santa Fe in his biggest-ever deal, he is looking to sell off his stakes in two other big railroad companies, Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern.

headline.main: Buffett to Sell Stakes in 2 Other Railroad Firms

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
